content:
We've released a new version of the Atom language-cql plugin. Here are the release notes:
https://github.com/cqframework/atom_cql_support/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md

  • Update to cql-language-server 1.5.2
  • Update to cql-translator 1.5.4
  • Update to cql-evaluator 1.3.0
  • Performance enhancements to large CQL projects (such as WHO ANC)
